description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nKindling:
After an enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.
name: Flamehook Sickle
